name: Q1 2024 Financial Performance Review
content:
Q1 2024 Financial Performance Review

Executive Summary:

Financial performance analysis for Q1 2024 showing strong growth in revenue and improved operational efficiency.

Revenue Highlights:

  • Total Revenue: $12.5M (+28% YoY)

    • Enterprise: $8.2M (+35%)

    • SMB: $3.1M (+22%)

    • Individual: $1.2M (+15%)

  • ARR: $48M (+32% YoY)

  • Net Revenue Retention: 118%

Cost Analysis:

  1. Operating Expenses: $9.8M

    • R&D: $4.2M (34%)

    • Sales & Marketing: $3.1M (25%)

    • G&A: $2.5M (20%)

  2. COGS: $2.1M

    • Infrastructure: $1.2M

    • Support: $0.9M

Key Metrics:

  • Gross Margin: 83%

  • Operating Margin: 5%

  • CAC: $12,500

  • LTV/CAC: 5.2

Cash Position:

  • Cash Balance: $28.5M

  • Burn Rate: $800K/month

  • Runway: 36 months

Growth Drivers:

  1. Enterprise Expansion

    • 5 new enterprise clients

    • 3 major upgrades

  2. Product Innovation

    • AI features launch

    • Platform integration

Q2 Outlook:

  • Revenue target: $14M

  • New product launch

  • Market expansion
